summary:
For more than 16 years I worked in the cultural heritage sector in different functions (coordinator, researcher, networker). Main goal of these cooperation projects has been to preserve, to study and to make cultural heritage more accessible. Knowledge transfer, exchange and digitization were always central. I have lived and worked in different countries and I can therefore move well in an international environment thanks to the knowledge of different languages. In my work I use an interdisciplinary and integrated approach and I strive to lay connections between governmental and non governmental organizations, the academic world and the heritage sector at national and international level. I can work very well independently but I find cooperation with others important and inspiring.
Skills: accurate, balanced, independent, flexible, committed, dedicated, friendly, responsible, analytical.
At present I work at the Consular Section of the Italian Embassy as a staff member.
